tests.name: PR Submission and Merge
tests.command: npm test -- -t 'PR was successfully created and merged'

tests.name: POST /users - Create a new user
tests.command: npm test -- -t 'POST /users should create a new user'

tests.name: GET /users/:id - Retrieve user details
tests.command: npm test -- -t 'GET /users/:id should return user details'

tests.name: PUT /users/:id - Update user details
tests.command: npm test -- -t 'PUT /users/:id should update user details'

tests.name: DELETE /users/:id - Delete a user
tests.command: npm test -- -t 'DELETE /users/:id should delete the user'
